verbs.description: Newshound Matt Drudge [V: has] put up a blaring siren on his website ahead of Trump 's announcement .
[ARG0: Newshound Matt Drudge] has [V: put] up [ARG1: a blaring siren] [ARGM-LOC: on his website] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of Trump 's announcement] .
Newshound Matt Drudge has put up a [V: blaring] [ARG0: siren] on his website ahead of Trump 's announcement .
